name: Box Puzzle!
description:
Game Description: A very devious looking square to eliminate class leisure game.

Game Features: The game with new ideas, using light cowboy theme on the vision,the traditional game play,the traditional tetris can also satisfy you?There are more fun to stimulate is waiting for you.Good control of the rhythm of the heart jump,start a new eliminate trip!

Playing Method: Players need to place the block in the main interface,horizontal or vertical when the polygon is filled in with can complete score,if successive eliminate more there will be additional combo points.To eliminate the more,the higher the score!And we also joined the combo eliminate reward and rankings,let you and your friends to meet the challenge from the top!
